pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with the NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke with the Secretary General of the North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO), Jens Stoltenberg.

The Secretary General congratulated the Prime Minister on his re-election.  The Prime Minister and the Secretary General discussed the upcoming NATO Leaders Meeting in London, United Kingdom as an important opportunity to demonstrate the continued importance of the Alliance to Euro-Atlantic security and defence.  They agreed that NATO and the unity of the Alliance were all the more relevant in today’s context of emerging and evolving security challenges, and looked forward to a productive meeting in London on NATO’s seventieth anniversary.

The Prime Minister reiterated Canada’s steadfast commitment to the Alliance and our ongoing contributions to key NATO missions across the spectrum of its operations.
